💡 Usage Commands:

📊 Basic Commands:
  upid universal status          # Show cluster health
  upid universal analyze         # Analyze resources
  upid universal optimize        # Get optimizations
  upid universal report          # Generate reports

🔧 Advanced Commands:
  upid universal status --format json    # JSON output
  upid universal analyze --namespace kube-system
  upid universal optimize --dry-run      # Preview only
  upid universal report --output report.html

🌍 Works with ANY cluster:
  • Docker Desktop
  • Minikube
  • Kind
  • K3s
  • EKS (AWS)
  • AKS (Azure)
  • GKE (Google)
  • Any other Kubernetes cluster
